articles.description: The trusty old Shuttle is being made into a museum display, and it'll be the first time the 20-story spacecraft is fully stacked outside of a NASA facility.
articles.content:
The Space Shuttle is going to look launch ready once again, although this time the retired spacecraft wont be firing its engines.
